resources.string: Bluetooth device may not be able to search, Please turn on the location service function of the mobile phone first. Do you want to turn it on?
The update process takes about two minutes.\nDo not turn off or disconnect the power supply.\nDo not keep the device away from the mobile phone during update.
Please agree to and accept all terms of Privacy Policy before using the App.
Read the full version of "{privacy}Privacy Policy{/privacy}".

Welcome to the App. Please carefully read and understand each term of "Privacy Policy", including but not limited to:
1. Obtaining network service for the necessary network resource.
2. Obtaining location information for Bluetooth device search.
3. When the user is not using the application, the location information will not be obtained.
4. After the application is closed, the access to location information will be closed at the same time.

If you agree, please click "Agree" to start accepting our services.
Only letters, numbers and partial punctuation( !@#$%^&(),.–=_[] + )
